Class EventsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.usecases.EventsManager

  • public class EventsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The EventsManager holds a list of Events, and modify Event with its corresponding Users.
    Since:
    2020-10-31
    Version:
    4.0
    Author:
    Haoze Huang, Zewen Ma

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        check for successful removal
